insert into locator(id, name, code, length, width, height, weight, type, state, warehouse_id, shelves_id, shelves_name, create_id, creator, create_time, update_id, updator, update_time) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.length,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.width,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.height,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.shelvesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.shelvesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update locator
name = #{name},
code = #{code},
length = #{length},
width = #{width},
height = #{height},
weight = #{weight},
type = #{type},
state = #{state},
warehouse_id = #{warehouseId},
shelves_id = #{shelvesId},
shelves_name = #{shelvesName},
create_id = #{createId},
creator = #{creator},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_id = #{updateId},
updator = #{updator},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}

#{item}
and state in (0,3) and type = "[2,7]"

select locator.id as id, locator.name as name, locator.code as code, locator.length as length, locator.width as width, locator.height as height, locator.weight as weight, locator.type as type, locator.state as state, locator.warehouse_id as warehouseId, locator.shelves_id as shelvesId, locator.shelves_name as shelvesName, locator.create_id as createId, locator.creator as creator, locator.create_time as createTime, locator.update_id as updateId, locator.updator as updator, locator.update_time as updateTime,warehouse.name as warehouseName from locator,warehouse where locator.warehouse_id = warehouse.id
and locator.id like concat('%',#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and locator.name like concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and locator.code like concat('%',#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and locator.length like concat('%',#{length,jdbcType=DOUBLE},'%')
and locator.width like concat('%',#{width,jdbcType=DOUBLE},'%')
and locator.height like concat('%',#{height,jdbcType=DOUBLE},'%')
and locator.weight like concat('%',#{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},'%')
and locator.type like concat('%',#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and locator.state like concat('%',#{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and locator.warehouse_id like concat('%',#{warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and locator.shelves_id like concat('%',#{shelvesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and locator.shelves_name like concat('%',#{shelvesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and locator.create_id like concat('%',#{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and locator.creator like concat('%',#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and locator.create_time like concat('%',#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and locator.update_id like concat('%',#{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and locator.updator like concat('%',#{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and locator.update_time like concat('%',#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
order by locator.update_time desc

from locator where warehouse_id = #{warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and state = "2"
